hidden_dimensions.name: Length relative to height
hidden_dimensions.description: Users want dresses that are an appropriate length for their height, avoiding being too short or too long. This is especially important for mini or midi dresses.  Also, the height of the wearer affects how high slits are.

hidden_dimensions.name: Fabric weight/thickness
hidden_dimensions.description: Users care about the thickness and weight of the fabric, especially in relation to the season. They want to avoid fabrics that are too thin and see-through, or too heavy for warm weather. Wanting good quality material.

hidden_dimensions.name: Fit and Flattering
hidden_dimensions.description: Users want dresses that fit well and are flattering to their figure. This includes avoiding dresses that are too clingy or frumpy, and finding styles that complement their body type.  Also concerning the belly area.
example_vocabulary: if you have a bit of a belly

hidden_dimensions.name: Occasion Appropriateness
hidden_dimensions.description: Users consider the appropriateness of the dress for specific events or occasions. This includes formality, seasonality, and modesty.

hidden_dimensions.name: Comfort and Feel
hidden_dimensions.description: Users value comfort and how the dress feels against their skin. They seek soft, comfortable, and easy-to-wear materials.
